resources.string: Aladdin is a 2019 American musical fantasy film produced by Wait Disney Picture.Directed by Guy Ritchie.from a script he co-wrote with John Agust. it is a live-action adaptation of Disney 1992 animated film of the same name ,which itself is based on the eponymous tale from one Thousand and one Nights.[1][a] The film stars Will Smith.Mena Massoud,Naomi Scott,Marwan Kenzari,Navid Negahban,Nasim Pedrad,Billy Magnussen,and Numan Actor,as well as
